column4: and get exercise. Getting exercise can be boring or just not for you but playing sports is a way to help you and a more funnier way to play outside. At the park or at your backyard you can practice playing your sport and seeing what can you improve or what you already good at. At the park you can meet people to train you and its space out so you have a lot of movement. essay_id: 'Students should have a career that they want to commit to or even thinking about what they want to do in the future at a young age.

Students usually don't know what they want to do in the future or out of high school. It is good thing for students to commit to something they see their selves in for a long period of time. Students should already have a thought on what they like to do. They should have the mindset on what they want to do in the future as well. Parents don't want their kid/s to sit around the house all day. The parents would want the best for their kid/s and would be proud on whatever they want to do when they grow up.

pred: they would have certain studies for students for what they want to do in the future. Teachers and counselors will tell you and help you what you need in the future and on what you want to do. Students will need a minimum of Sol's that they need to past and a selection of classes that they need to take. Teachers and counselors will ask you what colleges you want to go to or where you want to apply to. They will tell you what you need to do for you to get into a college that you are willing to go. Any teachers or counselors will help you on where you want to go or what you want to do with yourself in the future.

essay_id: While students are trying to commit a career that they want to do

column4: and even irritating. Committing to a career is a lot
column5: but it is also a relief because you don't have to think last minute on what career you choose to do in life. Some students thinking or committing a career is fun to them. They want to get out of high school already just to see how life will work on what they want to do but
column6: they should never rush on what's in front of them and have fun while it last.

essay_id: Students should always have a career or even have a thought of in their mind for the future. They should always think about the future because if they don't it might effect them in some way. It is very important to think ahead of the game from everybody else.
